page.title: 17THE PLYMSTOCK BROADWAY
page.content: The Broadway is a pedestrian {shopping precinct.}In our survey, we found that it satisfied many of the needs of the{older generation}in the Plymstock area because: 1. It is very convenient. 2. It is not usually crowded. 3. It has free parking. 4. It has good service. 5. It has a good variety of{shops. We found that most of the people prefer shopping on the Broadway than in the city centre. It has some disadvantages as the range of clothes shops is limited. The majority of people shop weekly, only shopping 1-2 hours. Thursday is the most popular day to shop and the popular shops are Fine Fare, Co-op and Woolworths. This is because they are food shops and people need food the most.
